channel.title: [PI] Veng bug?
channel.description:
My vengeance is working 99%, and my problem is when i use vengeance and someone speced me X with wepon or anything and i died, then the veng didn't come with him ?
This happens only if i had 0 HP, here is a picture, he was 4 hp, we must die both, but look:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/noQDCvA.png[/img]
If you guys don't understand me, here is a vid:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qzs3y7Yoztk[/youtube]

item.title: [PI] Veng bug?
item.dc:creator: @Bhpk Bhpk
item.description:
@Bhpk wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:11, topic:522186”]add something like…

if(c.vengOn) { c.vengOn = true; c.sendMessage("Vengeance is still on after you die don't worry!"); return; }

Or something like that. You will have to configure as needed as I can’t test.[/quote]No not working bro. Another idea/code ?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Veng bug?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Bhpk, post:6, topic:522186”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=640690.msg4317027#msg4317027 date=1371668079]
Yeah, L&P is perfectly right. You need to take some initiative and do it yourself.
[/quote]Dude, i can’t do it my self, i made this topic not for fun, i made this topic to not do it for my self, i made this topic to you help me with it!

*** Loveandpower. what ecatlly i add on dead method on playerassistant.java ?

Can you tell me the code ?[/quote]
Oh yes, I totally believe that people make help topics for fun.
And you did make this topic for yourself. You made if for you to get help.
We don’t know your code
We don’t know your variables
We don’t know your server.
So we can only do so much.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Veng bug?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

add something like…

if(c.vengOn) { c.vengOn = true; c.sendMessage("Vengeance is still on after you die don't worry!"); return; }

Or something like that. You will have to configure as needed as I can’t test.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Veng bug?
item.dc:creator: @Bhpk Bhpk
item.description:
@Bhpk wrote:

Vengeance method?

[code]/*
*Vengeance
*/
public void castVeng() {
if(c.playerLevel[6] < 94) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell.”);
return;
}
if(c.playerLevel[1] < 40) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a defence level of 40 to cast this spell.”);
return;
}
if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(9075, 4) || !c.getItems().playerHasItem(557, 10) || !c.getItems().playerHasItem(560, 2)) {
c.sendMessage(“You don’t have the required runes to cast this spell!”);
return;
}
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastVeng < 30000) {
c.sendMessage(“You can only cast vengeance every 30 seconds.”);
return;
}
if(c.vengOn) {
c.sendMessage(“Vengeance is activated!”);
return;
}
c.startAnimation(4410);
c.gfx100(604);
c.getItems().deleteItem2(9075, 4);
c.getItems().deleteItem2(557, 10);//For these you need to change to deleteItem(item, itemslot, amount);.
c.getItems().deleteItem2(560, 2);
refreshSkill(6);
c.vengOn = true;
c.lastVeng = System.currentTimeMillis();
}

public void vengOther() {
Client c2 = (Client)PlayerHandler.players[c.playerIndex];
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastVeng > 30000) {
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(557,10) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(9075,4) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(560,2)) {
c2.vengOn = true;
c2.lastVeng = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.startAnimation(4410);
c2.gfx100(604);
c2.sendMessage(“You know have the power of Vengeance!”);
c.getItems().deleteItem(557,c.getItems().getItemSlot(557),10);
c.getItems().deleteItem(560,c.getItems().getItemSlot(560),2);
c.getItems().deleteItem(9075,c.getItems().getItemSlot(9075),4);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You do not have the required runes to cast this spell.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You must wait 30 seconds before casting this again.”);
}
}

public void vengMe() {
	if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastVeng > 30000) {
		if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(557, 10)
				&& c.getItems().playerHasItem(9075, 4)
				&& c.getItems().playerHasItem(560, 2)) {
			c.vengOn = true;
			c.lastVeng = System.currentTimeMillis();
			c.startAnimation(4410);
			c.gfx100(604);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(557, c.getItems().getItemSlot(557), 10);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(560, c.getItems().getItemSlot(560), 2);
			c.getItems().deleteItem(9075, c.getItems().getItemSlot(9075), 4);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You do not have the required runes to cast this spell.");
		}
	} else {
		c.sendMessage("Vengeance can only be used once in 30 seconds.");
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic
